FDM_CONFIG.NAME: F-104
FDM_CONFIG.METRICS: AC_WINGAREA 196 AC_WINGSPAN 22 AC_CHORD 10 AC_HTAILAREA 48.6 AC_HTAILARM 16.3 AC_VTAILAREA 50.2 AC_LV 16.3 AC_IXX 3600 AC_IYY 59000 AC_IZZ 60000 AC_IXZ 0 AC_EMPTYWT 16300 AC_CGLOC 261.8 0.0 8.1 AC_AERORP 261.8 0.0 0.0 AC_EYEPTLOC 467.3 0.0 29.1 AC_POINTMASS 180.0 467.3 0.0 9.4
FDM_CONFIG.UNDERCARRIAGE:
AC_GEAR NOSE 404.0 0.0 -56.9 2500 800 0.5 0.8 0.02 STEERABLE NOSE 20 RETRACT AC_GEAR LEFT_MAIN 221.3 -99.0 -56.9 5400 1000 0.5 0.8 0.02 FIXED LEFT 0 RETRACT AC_GEAR RIGHT_MAIN 221.3 99.0 -56.9 5400 1000 0.5 0.8 0.02 FIXED RIGHT 0 RETRACT
AC_GEAR VF 181.4 0.0 -42.9 5000 1000 0.2 0.2 0.2 FIXED NONE 0 FIXED AC_GEAR VT 20.0 0.0 95.4 10000 1000 0.2 0.2 0.2 FIXED NONE 0 FIXED AC_GEAR WT_LEFT 192.8 -128.9 0.0 10000 1000 0.2 0.2 0.2 FIXED NONE 0 FIXED AC_GEAR WT_RIGHT 192.8 128.9 0.0 10000 1000 0.2 0.2 0.2 FIXED NONE 0 FIXED AC_GEAR RADOME 610.4 0.0 -5.7 10000 1000 0.2 0.2 0.2 FIXED NONE 0 FIXED

PROPULSION.AC_ENGINE: XLOC 0.0 YLOC 0.0 ZLOC 0.0 PITCH 0.0 YAW 0.0 FEED 0 FEED 1
PROPULSION.AC_TANK: XLOC 192.8 YLOC -71.8 ZLOC 0.0 RADIUS 78.8 CAPACITY 3486.0 CONTENTS 3486.0
XLOC 192.8 YLOC 71.8 ZLOC 0.0 RADIUS 78.8 CAPACITY 3486.0 CONTENTS 3486.0

FLIGHT_CONTROL.NAME: F-104 Direct
FLIGHT_CONTROL.COMPONENT: INPUT fcs/pitch-trim-sum MIN -17.0 MAX 5.0 OUTPUT fcs/elevator-pos-rad GAIN 0.01745
INPUT fcs/roll-trim-sum MIN -17.5 MAX 17.5 GAIN 0.01745 OUTPUT fcs/left-aileron-pos-rad
INPUT fcs/roll-trim-sum MIN -17.5 MAX 17.5 INVERT GAIN 0.01745 OUTPUT fcs/right-aileron-pos-rad
INPUT fcs/yaw-trim-sum MIN -25 MAX 25 GAIN 0.01745 OUTPUT fcs/rudder-pos-rad

AXIS.NAME: LIFT
AXIS.COEFFICIENT: Lift_due_to_alpha 2 velocities/mach-norm aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | aero/alpha-rad 0.257 3.440 1.800 2.005
Lift_due_to_Elevator_Deflection 2 velocities/mach-norm aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | fcs/elevator-pos-rad 0.257 0.68 1.800 0.52
Lift_at_zero_alpha 2 velocities/mach-norm aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft 0.257 0.240 1.800 0.122
Lift_due_to_pitch_rate 2 aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | velocities/q-aero-rad_sec | aero/ci2vel 0.257 2.30 1.800 1.90
Lift_due_to_alpha_rate 2 velocities/mach-norm aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | aero/alphadot-rad_sec | aero/ci2vel 0.257 0.66 1.800 0.82

AXIS.NAME: DRAG
AXIS.COEFFICIENT: Drag_minimum 2 velocities/mach-norm aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | aero/alpha-rad 0.257 0.455 1.800 0.384
Drag_at_zero_lift 2 velocities/mach-norm aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft 0.257 0.1189 1.800 0.0480
Drag_due_to_Elevator_Deflection aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | fcs/mag-elevator-pos-rad 0.0

AXIS.NAME: SIDE
AXIS.COEFFICIENT: Side_force_due_to_beta 2 velocities/mach-norm aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | aero/beta-rad 0.257 -1.180 1.800 -1.045
Side_force_due_to_aileron aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | fcs/left-aileron-pos-rad 0.0
Side_force_due_to_rudder 2 velocities/mach-norm aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | fcs/rudder-pos-rad 0.257 0.329 1.800 0.087
Side_force_due_to_roll_rate aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | aero/bi2vel | velocities/p-aero-rad_sec 0.0
Side_force_due_to_yaw_rate aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | aero/bi2vel | velocities/r-aero-rad_sec 0.0

AXIS.NAME: ROLL
AXIS.COEFFICIENT: Roll_moment_due_to_beta 2 velocities/mach-norm aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | metrics/bw-ft | aero/beta-rad 0.257 -0.1750 1.800 -0.0930
Roll_moment_due_to_roll_rate_(roll_damping) 2 velocities/mach-norm aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | metrics/bw-ft | aero/bi2vel | velocities/p-rad_sec 0.257 -0.285 1.800 -0.272
Roll_moment_due_to_yaw_rate 2 velocities/mach-norm aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | metrics/bw-ft | aero/bi2vel | velocities/r-rad_sec 0.257 0.2650 1.800 0.1540
Roll_moment_due_to_aileron 2 velocities/mach-norm aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | metrics/bw-ft | fcs/left-aileron-pos-rad 0.257 0.0392 1.800 0.0173
Roll_moment_due_to_rudder 2 velocities/mach-norm aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | metrics/bw-ft | fcs/rudder-pos-rad 0.257 0.0448 1.800 0.0079

AXIS.NAME: PITCH
AXIS.COEFFICIENT: Pitch_moment_due_to_alpha 2 aero/alpha-rad aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | metrics/cbarw-ft | aero/alpha-rad 0.257 -0.644 1.800 -1.308
Pitching_moment_at_zero_alpha 2 velocities/mach-norm aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | metrics/cbarw-ft 0.257 0.030 1.800 -0.028
Pitch_moment_due_to_pitch_rate 2 velocities/mach-norm aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | metrics/cbarw-ft | aero/ci2vel | velocities/q-rad_sec 0.257 -5.84 1.800 -4.83
Pitch_moment_due_to_alpha_rate 2 aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | metrics/cbarw-ft | aero/ci2vel | aero/alphadot-rad_sec 0.257 -1.64 1.800 -2.05
Pitch_moment_due_to_elevator_deflection 2 velocities/mach-norm aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | metrics/cbarw-ft | fcs/elevator-pos-rad 0.257 -1.600 1.800 -1.410

AXIS.NAME: YAW
AXIS.COEFFICIENT: Yaw_moment_due_to_beta 2 velocities/mach-norm aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | metrics/bw-ft | aero/beta-rad 0.257 0.5070 1.800 0.2420
Yaw_moment_due_to_roll_rate 2 velocities/mach-norm aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | metrics/bw-ft | aero/bi2vel | velocities/p-rad_sec 0.257 -0.1440 1.800 -0.0930
Yaw_moment_due_to_yaw_rate 2 velocities/mach-norm aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | metrics/bw-ft | aero/bi2vel | velocities/r-rad_sec 0.257 -0.7530 1.800 -0.6490
Yaw_moment_due_to_aileron 2 velocities/mach-norm aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | metrics/bw-ft | fcs/left-aileron-pos-rad 0.257 0.0042 1.800 0.0025
Yaw_moment_due_to_rudder 2 velocities/mach-norm aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | metrics/bw-ft | fcs/rudder-pos-rad 0.257 -0.1645 1.800 -0.0435

FDM_CONFIG.OUTPUT: RATE_IN_HZ 10 SIMULATION OFF ATMOSPHERE OFF MASSPROPS ON AEROSURFACES ON RATES ON VELOCITIES ON FORCES ON MOMENTS ON POSITION ON COEFFICIENTS ON GROUND_REACTIONS ON FCS ON PROPULSION ON
